Pre-Game Insights: The Hornets have lost each of their last 10 games against teams that held a winning record.
The Cavaliers have won 19 of their last 20 night games against teams that held a losing record.
The Cavaliers have covered the spread in seven of their last eight games.
The Hornets have failed to cover the spread in eight of their last 10 night games against Central Division opponents that held a winning record.
The Hornets have won four of their last six games as road underdogs against the Cavaliers following a loss.
The Cavaliers have lost six of their last 12 games as favorites against Southeast Division opponents following a win.
The Cavaliers have failed to cover the spread in eight of their last 10 games at Rocket Mortgage FieldHouse against Hornets teams that held a losing record.
The Hornets have covered the spread in four of their last five games as road underdogs following a loss.
Nine of the Cavaliers' last 10 games as favorites following a road win have gone OVER the total points line.
Eight of the Hornets' last nine games as underdogs have gone UNDER the total points line.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The line was always going to be massive for this one, but I still don't think it's enough to sway me from backing the Cavaliers to stay hot with another win and cover at home in this one.
Others: Evan Mobley led the team in scoring with 34 points, 10 rebounds, and four assists on 14 of 21 shooting, Caris LeVert added 17 points off the bench while Darius Garland chipped in with 16 points and nine assists.
The Hornets got off to a great start and looked to be in full control when they poured in 65 points in the first half to lead by 13 points.
The Hornets saw all their hard work go to waste in the second half where they scored just 29 points to allow the Pistons off the hook in the end.
The Cavaliers shot 53 percent from the field and 15 of 40 from the 3-point line as they played excellent defense in the first quarter to jump out to an immediate double-digit lead.
The Cavs just kept their foot on the gas until the lead ballooned to 27 points in the third quarter.
